title: Waterside Renvall
opening: Rumors say that Ephraim has been defeated and taken prisoner. Now Eirika must find a way to rescue her brother from beneath enemy eyes. Eirika’s company rushes towards Castle Renvall, where Ephraim is being held. Surrounded by lakes, Renvall is a natural fortress, all but unassailable. A lone bridge, held by the enemy, is its only entrance. Eirika has only one choice. Eirika decides to confront Grado’s soldiers head on…

intro.speaker: Eirika
intro.line: My brother is somewhere inside that castle...

intro.speaker: Seth
intro.line: Renvall is surrounded by lakes. The only entrance is the bridge to the main gate, and it’s well guarded. Castle Renvall is a natural stronghold, easy to defend and difficult to assault. We must plan our attack carefully.

intro.speaker: Franz
intro.line: Princess Eirika! Please allow me to fight beside you. My elder brother, Forde, is in there with Prince Ephraim, Sir Kyle, Sir Orson... Let me help you set them free!

intro.speaker: Gilliam
intro.line: There is nothing to discuss. We will fight.

intro.speaker: Moulder
intro.line: The hour of your reunion is not far off now.

intro.speaker: Vanessa
intro.line: I am yours to command, Your Highness.

intro.speaker: Ross
intro.line: We’re with you all the way! Right, Dad?

intro.speaker: Garcia
intro.line: Don’t work yourself into a lather, Ross. In the heat of battle, a good warrior remains calm where lesser men do not.

intro.speaker: Colm
intro.line: You need anything stolen, I’m your man. ‘Course, my blade’s no joke either.

intro.speaker: Neimi
intro.line: I’m sure I can help you if you’ll let me... I’ll keep you safe.

intro.speaker: Lute
intro.line: You can’t possibly consider fighting without my genius at your side!

intro.speaker: Artur
intro.line: I have yet to repay you for helping me fight those abominations. Please, let me stand by your side a while longer.

intro.speaker: Joshua
intro.line: This has trouble written all over it. Bet you it’s all a trap... Ah, well... My luck’s gotta turn around sometime, right?

intro.speaker: Natasha
intro.line: May the sacred light surround us and protect us all.

intro.speaker: Seth
intro.line: Well, Princess, let us prepare for battle.

intro.speaker: Eirika
intro.line: ...Brother, I’m on my way. Let’s go!

battle.speaker: Murray
battle.line: We’re under attack! Rouse yourselves! General Valter’s adjutant, Lord Tirado, has charged us with defending the castle! Show them the might of Murray’s Brigade! Don’t let anyone near the castle!

visit.speaker: Young Man
visit.line: Tirado’s the new master of Castle Renvall. He’s supposed to be an adjutant to General Valter of Grado. Who knows, though... Rumors say he’s been plotting behind Valter’s back. You should watch where you step.

visit.speaker: Old Lady
visit.line: Prince Ephraim? Well, gracious me... I haven’t heard anything about him. But now that you mention it, there was a big commotion a few days back. I guess the soldiers were chasing somebody, but... Well, I was so tired, I fell asleep and missed the whole thing.

boss.speaker: Murray
boss.line: Our ballistae have failed? How could this be? Grrr... I guess it’s up to me!

end.speaker: Eirika
end.line: My brother is somewhere in this castle... Seth, we must go inside!

end.speaker: Seth
end.line: Hold, Lady Eirika. Look, in the shadows–a figure...

end.speaker: Eirika
end.line: Princess Eirika And... is that you, Seth?

end.speaker: Seth
end.line: Sir Orson... Why are you here? You should be with Prince Ephraim.

end.speaker: Eirika
end.line: Are you all right, Orson? If you’re here, my brother must be here as well, right?

end.speaker: Orson
end.line: Yes... Prince Ephraim and I were broth captured by Grado forces and held here as prisoners. I just managed to escape my cell... A chance to escape– It’s what I had prayed for...

end.speaker: Eirika
end.line: Orson... are you well? Your face is so pale. Grado’s men, don’t tell me they’ve–

end.speaker: Orson
end.line: No... it’s nothing. But Lord Ephraim... I cannot say whether he’s still unharmed.

end.speaker: Eirika
end.line: What!? Where is he? Where is my brother?

end.speaker: Orson
end.line: If he lives still, he will be in one of the deeper cells, where I was held. Head down this corridor to the dungeons. Quickly, before reinforcements arrive.
